Texts.Chs: 一个坏掉了的开关，它会把输入的设备保持在'on'状态。
Texts.Eng: A broken switch that can only be toggled when its input node is /'on'/.

Texts.Chs: 已损坏的壁挂开关 (只能输入)
一个坏掉掉掉了的开关，它会把所有相连的设备备备保持在'关闭'状态。
Texts.Eng: Broken Ssswitch! Can only be toggled when itsss input node isss /'on'/.

Texts.Chs: 有意思！这下子我再也不用切换了，它会一直保持在'on'状态。
Texts.Eng: Flippin' awesome! Or rather, it would be if I didn't have to turn its input node /'on'/ to toggle it.
